PositionHistory.Title: Senior Project Manager, Delivery Lead and individual contributor
PositionHistory.Description:
JavaScript   Angular   Ruby on Rails


• Helped in building the initial Travel Tripper Hyderabad engineering team.
• Architect & drive engineering design and develop software applications. Hands-on coding and code reviews.
Ensure technical debt is resolved in every iteration and prevent it using best practices including Code
Reviews, focus on quality, Continuous Integration and Test Driven Development.
• Manage releases and deployments to AWS. Use appropriate AWS offering - S3, Cloud-front, EC2, Elastic
Beanstalk, Lambda etc. based on the application requirement.
• Work with cross-functional team of product managers, product designers, developers and QA to deliver a
quality product.
• Discover the true requirements underlying feature requests and translate them into technical solutions. Lead
engineering efforts to ensure timely and quality delivery.
•   Collaborate with the support team. Triage technical issues and ensure their timely resolution.
•   Collaborate with talent acquisition team for screening, interviewing and recruitment of the right talent for the team.
•   Mentor, motivate and coach the engineering team members and help them develop and grow along their career paths
•   Roadmap planning, Project and Resource management.
•   Successfully delivered custom Booking Engine for Marina Bay Sands and Call center application for Caesars
Entertainment. Two of the most high profile customers for Travel Tripper. Worked with customer teams and product
managers to analyse requirements. Setup the engineering teams, initial architecture and process and lead the teams
to successfully deliver the products. I continuously work with the customer and represent the engineering team.
• Maintain legacy Ruby on Rails application and work with the team to add new features.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 42% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Cofounder, Engineering Manager, Lead Developer & Trainer
PositionHistory.Description:
CMISOFT (Founded in April 2010 - incorporated as Private Limited firm on 04 August 2011)
JavaScript   Angular   Ruby on Rails   HTML/CSS   Elixir


• Setup project teams and worked on developing various web applications. Ruby on Rails Development with Ruby on Rails. Managed releases & deployments to dedicated linux servers as well as on Heroku & AWS.
•   Worked as a team mentor/SME at Deloitte Bangalore, for a Ruby on Rails based Financial project.
•   Maintain legacy Ruby on Rails application. Keep it updated and develop new functionality.
•   Mentored team at Hughes Systique Corporation (HSC) Gurgaon, for a Ruby based Telecom project.
•   Worked with team at Nokia to guide, architect and develop a telecom application using Ruby on Rails.
•   Provided Corporate Training at many companies including: eDataWorld LLC, Hughes Systique Corporation,
Deloitte, Wipro, IBM, Verizon.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 55% of this job

sov:PositionHistoryUserArea.sov:NormalizedTitle: Cofounder Engineering Manager Lead Developer AND Trainer

PositionHistory.Title: Fullstack Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
JS   AngularJS   Ruby on Rails/ROR   Elixir   Salesforce/Apex


•   Developed Borrower/Investor Web platform using Ruby on Rails, AngularJS.
•   Implemented custom amortization and other financial formulas.
•   Implemented credit score/dashboard for underwriters.
•   API Development using Elixir / Phoenix framework.
•   Worked with integration with Salesforce. Implemented part of the solution within Salesforce Platform using
Apex.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 57% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Business Analyst
PositionHistory.Description:
Break down complex problems into understandable user stories. Prioritizing/scheduling the work to meet
deadlines. Define project scope, Create SRS, Work Breakdown Structure and User Stories.
• Work with engineering teams to estimate the amount work.
• Understand the problem statement / enhancements, gather the requirements, change requests & feedbacks
and explore potential solutions/recommendations.
• Work with project teams & project managers as a consultant to ensure successful delivery of project.

JobCategory.Comments: User Experience describes 33% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Lead Developer and Manager
PositionHistory.Description:
HTML   ASP   PHP   Ruby   VB


• Developed multiple applications in different technologies: ASP, PHP, VB, VB.NET & Ruby.
• Project Management: Managed various projects which include web design and web development projects in various domains: Real-Estate, E-commerce, CMS, MLM, Job site, Dating site, Auction, Immigration, Mortgage,
Book store, Event Management, etc. Monitoring project delivery to ensure that business requirements are met.
• Team Management: Managed a team of 45 software developers, product designers and QA. Trained team
members on PHP, HTML and JavaScript.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 63% of this job

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Chandresh Pant's experience appears to be strongly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Programming) and slightly concentrated in General Management (mostly People Oriented). Chandresh Pant has 19 years of work experience, with 12 years of management experience, including a low-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory:
Current position is a low-level management role: Senior Project Manager, Delivery Lead and individual contributor
Starting on 6/1/2016, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 3 years and 6 months:
	Title: Senior Project Manager, Delivery Lead and individual contributor for Travel Tripper India Private Limited
Starting on 4/1/2010, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 6 years and 3 months:
	Title: Cofounder, Engineering Manager, Lead Developer & Trainer for NCR
Starting on 8/1/2003, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 2 years:
	Title: Lead Developer and Manager for UG Software Technologies Pvt. Ltd
